src - package src
Root package for the Heist To The Museum.
src.entities - package src.entities
Contains the entities involved in the heist, the Master Thief and the Ordinary Thief.
src.interfaces - package src.interfaces
Contains interfaces for the shared regions and the logger to implement.
src.room - package src.room
Contains the Rooms which make up the Museum.
src.sharedRegions - package src.sharedRegions
This package contains the shared regions used by the Master Thief and Ordinary Thieves.
src.utils - package src.utils
Contains some utilities to be used for logging.
startOperations() - Method in interface src.interfaces.CollectionSiteInterface
Called by Master Thief to initiate operations
startOperations() - Method in class src.sharedRegions.CollectionSite
This is the first state change in the MasterThief life cycle it changes the MasterThief state to deciding what to do.
sumUpResults(int) - Method in interface src.interfaces.ConcentrationSiteInterface
The Master Thief announces the end of operations and shares the number of paintings acquired in the heist
sumUpResults(int) - Method in class src.sharedRegions.ConcentrationSite
The Master Thief announces the end of operations and shares the number of paintings acquired in the heist
